title: Straw Burning, from "Pendle Witches"
marks: Signature, Edition and Chop LRC, in pencil: [Paula Rego]
description: standing woman at center wearing a knee-length sleeveless dress, emerging from a veil-like mandorla (or wearing a veil?); woman holds several flowers in her PL hand; three rats in LRC; insects in LLC and ULC; large goat\'s head at L center
creditline: Gift of funds from the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
